title: ICYMI - Stacey Abrams on Fighting Voter Suppression in "Our Time Is Now"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Stacey Abrams on Fighting Voter Suppression in "Our Time Is Now"
description:
Fair Fight founder Stacey Abrams discusses the racial inequities exposed by COVID-19, the fight against police brutality and her book "Our Time Is Now."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
